name: SimCar
description:
This is a driving simulator game. Try to beat the green car in driving through the 4 light cones.

  • To start or stop driving click 1x on the scene.
  • Steer by moving mouse left and right of the center red box.
  • Accelerate by moving mouse above the red box.
  • Brake by moving mouse below the red box.
  • Press and hold R to go in reverse.

Your lap time is shown in the upper left corner. Anything under 40s is pretty good.
